message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $18000. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-value item that will bring you great benefits. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $16500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $16500. Would you be willing to meet me at $15000?
